As a young boy I thought what can I do to make the world a better place. So I went to the emoji movie. I don't think anything else has inspired me to be what I want to be. I think It's safe to say I want to persue in to a career of being an emoji. I have decided to be the number 0 emoji as it represents the amount of bad qualities this movie has if you thought this movie was bad then you should probably watch it another time whilst furiously masturbating to caitlyn Jenner. Overall it's the best movie going. I was going to kill myself last night but now the emoji movie has changed my thought on life and I'm going to meet Jesus and the legend herobrine. Have a good day everyone

this is surprisingly the worst movie i have ever seen. Before I entered the theatre I thought that the concept of this movie was so stupid there was no possible was it was gonna be good, but I honestly didnt expect it to be THIS BAD. This movie is basically a ripoff of some better animated movies and put together into a huge ugly mass. Well no matter what I say, stupid kids are still going to drag their parents into the theatre, so, oh well. Every day we stray further from god.
